title: amba mAmava
sahitya:
(rAgA:  ranjani)   
  amba mAmava akhila jagadamba mAmava muraLIrava ranjanI
			(rAgA:  niranjani)


anupallavi

  ambujAyata vilOcanI shAmbhavi janani niranjanI
			(rAg  janaranjani)


caraNam    vandAru tAvakIna bhakta vara kAmita phala pradE 
manda smita suvadanE mukunda sOdarI janaranjanI
